text: It’s not that no one cared, but that it’s a quarter to 1 in the morning in Madrid. https://t.co/8jTFP1cHqa

author: Classic Movies 🎞
text: It’s a big deal! Beating the no. 16 player in the world on clay us a big damn deal. Way to go @andy_murray! #AndyMurray #MadridOpen2022 🎾

text: Yes! There’s the break he’s been looking for. Now hold that serve @andy_murray💪💪💪 #MadridOpen2022
